#### The published [paper](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2590332220303031) and [data](https://knb.ecoinformatics.org/view/doi:10.5063/F1PZ575B) are available on-line.

This paper presents a methodology for integrating life-cycle assessments with impact mapping to quantify and map the cumulative pressure of food production.
